item.title: MIUI V11.0.3.0.QEHCNXM Fastboot update for Mi 8 Explorer China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Mi 8 Explorer China

Codename: ursa

Version: V11.0.3.0.QEHCNXM | 10.0

Size: 2.8 GB

MD5: 3085e679e53c5523a051796189516596

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to March 2020. Increased system security.
[App lock]
New: App lock is supported for all apps now
New: Revamped the start page and optimized some features
[Data usage]
Fix: Data usage warning appeared multiple times

Download: Here
